Vignettes

The following vignettes provide detailed illustrations of the mashr package, as well as guidance on correct application of the statistical methods.

  • Introduction to mashr
  • Introduction to mash: data-driven covariances
  • Simulation with non-canonical matrices
  • eQTL analysis outline
  • Accounting for correlations among measurements
  • Sample from mash posteriors
  • mashr with common baseline
  • mashr with no common baseline

Developed by Matthew Stephens, Sarah Urbut, Gao Wang, Yuxin Zou, Peter Carbonetto.
